text.content:
Charmed

Source: XPHB, page 361

While you have the Charmed condition, you experience the following effects. You can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with damaging abilities or Magical Effect|XPHB|magical effects.The charmer has Advantage|XPHB on any ability check to interact with you socially.

_srdData.name: Charmed
entries: While you have the Charmed condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Can't Harm the Charmer
entries: You can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with damaging abilities or {@variantrule Magical Effect|XPHB|magical effects}.

entries.name: Social Advantage
entries: The charmer has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check to interact with you socially.
